$interpreted: Sherlock: Lisa, about the motor oil you said you were buying yesterday...
Lisa: Finally here!
Sherlock: What's finally here? The motor oil?
Emily: Whew~ I'm exhausted. Had to ask so many people.
Lisa: How was it? What kind of information did you obtain? Tell me, all of it!

Emily: Ned Garcia Alznar; 
He's 27 years old, and currently a hunter.
Sherlock: What, you're buying motor oil from a hunter?
Lisa: How about the "other" important issue?
Emily: No wife, no girlfriend; doesn't even have a close female friend.
Lisa: Aha~ as expected from my bestie Emily! I know I can rely on you!

Emily: Didn't think that Lisa can actually fall head over heels in love with a man before...
Is he really that good?
Lisa: He is completely different than those stinkin brats who hit on me before. He has an honest and sincere personality, has an amazing figure too.
Lisa: You simply cannot ask for a better date...
Emily: Sidenote, your dad has been trying to get your attention for a while now...
Sherlock: ... Lisa, so um... where is the motor oil?
Lisa: Alright, alright, I'll go buy it later!
Lisa: Ah, right. Do you know the places where Ned regularly shows up?
Emily: Of course I do. Even better, I was able to get information about Ned's hunting routes! Here, I'll whisper it in your ear...

Lisa: Awesome, I better be on my way to nail him!
I'll go shopping with you for clothes next time~ see ya!
Sherlock: What the heck are you girls chatting about just now...

Emily: Did Lisa not tell you about this?
She found a man she likes.
Sherlock: WHAT!?

Lisa: Yikes~ I got lost here;
good thing you happen to pass by...
Lisa: It's just getting lost, probably don't have to be this afraid though?

Lisa: Yikes~ these beasts are trying to eat me; 
good thing you happen to pass by and saved me...
Lisa: Ooohh, feels pretty good. Let's use this one!
Lisa: Settle down, you morons! Wait until the star of the show arrives, then you can go nuts!
Lisa: By the way, why hasn't Ned show up? He sure is taking his sweet time... or is Emily's information incorrect?
Lisa: You guys are noisy!!
Lisa: Hahaha, now you all know who's boss~
Ned: These... did you kill all of them?
Lisa: T, that's not the case!

Lisa: I'm not that brutal. I usually take great care of animals. We were just playing and having fun. 
See~
Lisa: Ahaha, who's a good boy~

Lisa: Eh!? God, you are way too fragile~
At least wait until Ned isn't here before you die!
Ned: You...
Lisa: Ugh... P, please hear me out...
Ned: ... That's amazing. Do you realize how hard it is to capture these lizards?
Lisa: Huh?
Ned: It takes quite the skill to hunt so many lizards in one go. Is hunting something you do regularly?
Lisa: You're too kind. Hunting is just one of my many hobbies~
Ned: Really? It's rare to come across a girl who likes hunting. Would you mind having a chat? I would like to know you better.
Lisa: C, chat?

Lisa: Of course you can.
Let's go back to the Bazaar, Ned. We can have our chat there!
Ned: Sure. But umm, how did you know my name?

Lisa: L, let's not focus on the minute details...
We should get going as soon as we collect the prey!
